extendedInfo.description: Shop and buy pre-owned apparel at low prices!Great deals and bargains!Introducing the new SELL feature!You can now sell your own items on "The Posh Girl Closet Clearance" app. You keep 100% of the profits. We are simply allowing people to reach customers who want what they're selling. All sellers are responsible for their own invoicing and shipping.Browse through the items in the store and put them in your shopping cart. Play the "Bargain Game" to win a price. Wish you could have it for less? Then unlock the item and play again. You will never win a more expensive price.People are adding merchandise everyday so check back often. We will be adding features to the app on a regular basis to assist shoppers to find the items they want, and to help sellers to  connect with those customers.Be sure to select "Email Me Updates"  during the simple registration process if you would like to be notified about new features.As items are bought, they will no longer be listed in the app. So at times the amount of items for sale may look minimal but please bear with us as we work to update our database.

reviews.title: confusing
reviews.comment: I am trying to sell on the app and their is no guidance on how to do so. I thought this app would be similar to Poshmark but it is not. This app makes me want to get an Iphone or Ipad,.
reviews.author: Shennan Goodman
